name: feeding-foundation
description: Feeding Foundation - Community food resource mapping

scripts.minify-css: cleancss styles.css -o styles.min.css && cleancss add-location-inline.css -o add-location-inline.min.css
scripts.minify-js: terser script.js -o script.min.js --compress --mangle && terser add-location-inline.js -o add-location-inline.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.minify: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
